description: Marvin Harrison Jr. "tried to fight" to return to the game, OSU "can't let up 42 points in a game like that" and Steele Chambers would "die for any one of those guys in the locker...

title: BULLDOGS IMPRESSED BY BUCKEYE PASS ATTACK
description: The Georgia defense is impressed by Ohio State's "unique" pass attack led by a "very dynamic quarterback" in C.J. Stroud and a "really good player" in Marvin Harrison Jr.

title: CADE WILL "NEVER ADMIT" IMPACT OF INJURY
description: Cade Stover's poor performance against Michigan may have been due in part to an injury: “Everybody is banged up at the end of the season."

title: DAY TALKS OHIO STATE, PEACH BOWL, GEORGIA
description: Ohio State head coach Ryan Day spoke with the media on Monday as the Buckeyes are ready to roll in preparation for their Peach Bowl matchup with Georgia in the College Football...

title: “NOT A LOT OF PEOPLE GIVE US A CHANCE”
description: Ryan Day liked what he saw in Ohio State's final practices before the Peach Bowl and says the Buckeyes “know what we're in for, we know what the challenge is."

title: BUCKS, DAWGS WHO COULD‘VE SWITCHED SIDES
description: Ohio State and Georgia both tried hard to recruit many of each other’s current players, such as C.J. Stroud, Paris Johnson Jr., Kelee Ringo and Kendall Milton.

title: MR. BRIGHTSIDE
description: It's Christmas. Push the negativity and concern to the side for just one day.

title: MARVIN’S 12 MOST SPECTACULAR CATCHES
description: Marvin Harrison Jr. has made a habit of highlight-reel catches all year, so we ranked the 12 best catches that made him Ohio State’s first unanimous All-American wide receiver.

title: BOWL GAME BESTS
description: Heading into Ohio State's 55th bowl game, we take a look at Ohio State’s best individual passing, rushing and receiving performances in bowl games between 1920 and 2022.

title: DAY HIGH ON ALL FOUR WR SIGNEES
description: Ohio State’s incoming freshman wide receiver corps is no one-man band as Ryan Day expects all four 2023 wideout signees to be "really good players for us."

title: OSU IN TOP TWO FOR MARYLAND TE TRANSFER
description: CJ Dippre is set to announce his next stop on Tuesday, and will choose between Ohio State and Alabama.

title: O-LINE EXCITED FOR CHALLENGE VS. CARTER
description: The Buckeyes know it won’t be easy going up against Georgia defensive lineman Jalen Carter, but they’re relishing the opportunity to battle a projected top-five NFL draft pick.

title: “THE PROGRAM IS IN A GREAT PLACE”
description: With a national championship opportunity still on the table, Ryan Day is “not gonna overreact” to the setbacks on the gridiron and recruiting trail over the past month.

title: WHAT'S IN THE GAME PLAN FOR UGA?
description: What might the play-call sheet look like for Ryan Day and Jim Knowles on December 31?

title: JAYDEN BONSU
description: Jayden Bonsu has multi-positional potential as a big, physical safety in the Buckeyes’ 2023 class.

title: SMITH JR. “GLAD TO BE” AT OSU
description: Ohio State legacy signee Will Smith Jr. said he was “glad to be” following in his father's footsteps as he signed his National Letter of Intent Wednesday.

title: AJANI CORNELIUS TO OREGON
description: Ohio State misses out on one of its top transfer portal targets as former Rhode Island offensive tackle Ajani Cornelius commits to Oregon over OSU, Nebraska and Tennessee.

title: OHIO STATE ADDS TRANSFER KICKER
description: Ohio State adds a transfer kicker for the third consecutive year as former Kent State kicker Casey Magyar announces he will transfer to Ohio State as a preferred walk-on.

title: FULL-TIME POSITION FOR TRAYANUM TBD
description: Ryan Day says he'll sit down with Chip Trayanum after the season to decide whether he's more comfortable playing at running back or linebacker in 2023 and beyond.

title: HENRY PLANS TO TRAVEL TO PEACH BOWL
description: Avery Henry plans to travel with the team to Atlanta despite his osteosarcoma diagnosis and Ryan Day says the Buckeyes are “going to be a part of this fight with him.”

title: DAY TALKS '23 SIGNEES, DECOMMITMENTS, NIL
description: Day praises Ohio State's latest signees, touches on some missed opportunities on the recruiting trail and discusses how NIL impacted this year's class.

title: JOSHUA MICKENS
description: Ohio State has bolstered its defensive line for the 2023 class with the addition of Indiana prospect Joshua Mickens.

title: CARNELL TATE
description: Brian Hartline signs yet another top-10 wide receiver as Carnell Tate makes it official with the Buckeyes’ 2023 class.

title: CEDRICK HAWKINS
description: Following his mid-Rose Bowl commitment to start the year, Cedrick Hawkins ends 2022 as a Buckeye after inking his National Letter of Intent on Wednesday.

title: CALVIN SIMPSON-HUNT
description: Ohio State adds an athletic and physical cornerback as Calvin-Simpson Hunt signs with the 2023 recruiting class.

title: ARVELL REESE
description: Arvell Reese is the only linebacker signee for the 2023 class but Ohio State has big expectations for the Glenville product.

title: JASON MOORE
description: Ohio State adds a defensive lineman with plenty of potential as Jason Moore signs with the 2023 recruiting class.

title: LINCOLN KIENHOLZ
description: Ohio State adds a dual-threat presence to its quarterback room as Lincoln Kienholz signs with the 2023 recruiting class.

title: JERMAINE MATHEWS
description: Ohio State adds a defensive playmaker with a knack for finding the end zone as four-star cornerback Jermaine Mathews signs with the Buckeyes.

title: JELANI THURMAN
description: A 6-foot-5, 230-pound tight end with receiver-like athleticism and natural pass-catching ability, Jelani Thurman has the potential to develop into a major weapon for Ohio State.

title: MILES WALKER
description: Three-star offensive lineman Miles Walker inks his National Letter of Intent as Ohio State secures the No. 34 offensive tackle prospect and fourth-rated player in Connecticut.

title: BRYSON RODGERS
description: Ohio State adds a crisp route runner with a diverse route tree at wide receiver as Bryson Rodgers signs with the 2023 recruiting class.

description: Will Smith Jr. made a big rise in the recruiting rankings over the past year and will now look to build upon his father’s legendary legacy on Ohio State’s defensive line.

description: Top-50 prospect Noah Rogers adds another nationally elite pass catcher to Ohio State's deep stable of wideouts as the No. 7 WR in the country signs with the Buckeyes.

description: Brandon Inniss is the fifth composite five-star wide receiver to sign with Ohio State since 2019 and has the skills to quickly emerge as the Buckeyes’ next star pass-catcher.

title: SIGNING DAY CENTRAL
description: Your one-stop shop to learn more about all of Ohio State's signees during the early signing period.

title: JOSHUA PADILLA
description: Joshua Padilla has been the longest-standing Ohio State commitment and will play center when he arrives in Columbus.

title: KAYDEN MCDONALD
description: Four-star 2023 defensive tackle Kayden McDonald is a versatile defensive tackle that can also tote the rock on goal-line carries.

title: LUKE MONTGOMERY
description: As much of a must-get as any prospect in the 2023 class, Luke Montgomery has the traits to be a future leader of the Buckeyes’ offensive line both on and off the field.

title: AUSTIN SIEREVELD
description: Four-star offensive lineman Austin Siereveld chose Ohio State after much due diligence and will play as an interior offensive lineman in college.

title: MALIK HARTFORD
description: Malik Hartford is the third Lakota West player to sign with Ohio State in two years and has a skill set that could enable him to play multiple safety spots for the Buckeyes.

title: THE UNSURE THING
description: Underdogs ✓ coming off a loss ✓ postseason plans changed ✓ key players unavailable ✓ playing a virtual road game ✓ facing SEC champions ✓

title: WARD LEADS OSU’S WEEK 15 NFL STARS
description: A dominant game by Denzel Ward, Noah Brown scoring two touchdowns and Justin Fields and Terry McLaurin reaching 1,000 yards highlighted Ohio State’s Week 15 in the NFL.

title: CALEB BURTON SHEDS BLACK STRIPE
description: Wide receiver Caleb Burton is the 21st member of Ohio State’s freshman class of 2022 to lose his black stripe.

title: GABE POWERS LOSES BLACK STRIPE
description: Ohio State freshman linebacker Gabe Powers sheds his black stripe to "officially" become a Buckeye.

title: AVERY HENRY DIAGNOSED WITH BONE CANCER
description: Ohio State freshman offensive tackle Avery Henry announced Monday night he has been diagnosed with osteosarcoma, a form of bone cancer.

title: OSU A “VERY EASY” DECISION FOR FERLMANN
description: Long snapper John Ferlmann was already leaning toward becoming a Buckeye and saw everything he needed to see on his visit to finalize his decision to transfer to Ohio State.

title: JANTZEN DUNN TO KENTUCKY
description: Former Ohio State safety Jantzen Dunn has landed in his home state of Kentucky after entering the transfer portal less than a week ago.

title: FIELDS 3RD NFL QB TO RUSH FOR 1,000 YARDS
description: Justin Fields becomes the third quarterback in NFL history to rush for 1,000 yards in a single season, joining Michael Vick and Lamar Jackson.

title: OSU RUN GAME WILL HAVE ITS HANDS FULL
description: Georgia boasts the nation's top ranked rushing defense, allowing just 76.9 yards per game on 2.9 per attempt.

title: 49 BUCKEYE ATHLETES GRADUATING SUNDAY
description: Seven Ohio State football players and 49 total Buckeye student-athletes received degrees from the university at Sunday’s autumn commencement.

title: JOHNSON AMONG SENIOR TACKLE PARTICIPANTS
description: Paris Johnson Jr. joined the group of outgoing Ohio State players who participated in Saturday’s Senior Tackle at the Woody Hayes Athletic Center.

title: OHIO STATE ADDS TRANSFER LONG SNAPPER
description: John Ferlmann, who was the starting long snapper at Arizona State last season, is transferring to Ohio State.

title: BENNETT CHRISTIAN SHEDS BLACK STRIPE
description: Freshman tight end Bennett Christian shed his black stripe this week and is now officially a Buckeye.

title: OHIO STATE CAN COMPLETE THE NY6 CYCLE
description: With a win over Georgia in the Peach Bowl, Ohio State would become the first program in college football history to get a win in all of the New Year's Six bowl games.

title: “CAN'T FEEL SORRY FOR YOURSELF ANYMORE”
description: The Buckeyes went through “a lot of pain” after their loss to Michigan, but they’re done feeling sorry for themselves as they prepare for the Peach Bowl.

title: WHITE JERSEYS, GRAY SLEEVES FOR PEACH BOWL
description: Ohio State will wear white uniforms with gray sleeves for its CFP semifinal matchup with Georgia.

title: “BOTH TIGHT ENDS ARE VERY, VERY TALENTED”
description: Finding Brock Bowers and Darnell Washington before the snap is hard enough, but stopping them has proven nearly impossible for Georgia's opponents this season.

title: “I DESERVED TO WIN” BILETNIKOFF
description: It wasn't on his radar at the beginning of his sophomore year, but at the conclusion of the regular season, Marvin Harison Jr. felt deserving of the Biletnikoff Award.

title: BAILEY “ALWAYS WILLING TO DO STUFF EXTRA”
description: Marvin Harrison Jr., Emeka Egbuka and Cade Stover all described new tight ends coach Keenan Bailey as a tireless worker who goes above and beyond to help Ohio State’s players.

title: BROWN, HALL, WILLIAMS EXPECT TO BE HEALTHY
description: Ohio State’s Cameron Brown, Mike Hall Jr. and Miyan Williams all said they expect to be back to 100% for the Peach Bowl after battling injuries during the regular season.

description: 20 different Ohio State players addressed the media for the first time since the Buckeyes made the College Football Playoff to look ahead to the Peach Bowl vs. Georgia.

title: GEORGIA
description: Ryan Day knows Georgia quarterback Stetson Bennett is a key to the Bulldogs offense and forcing him into mistakes would go a long way in pulling an upset in the CFP.

title: C.J. DEFENDS JSN, CALLS CRITICISM “UNFAIR”
description: C.J. Stroud’s heard the criticism about him and his Buckeye teammates over the past few weeks, and he responded on Wednesday.

description: Steele Chambers will stay at Ohio State for his fifth-year senior season to get a third season of playing linebacker at the collegiate level under his belt.

description: Ohio State offensive tackle Dawand Jones is the second Buckeye to accept an invitation to this year's Senior Bowl.

title: X’S AND O’S WITH KYLE JONES
description: Kyle Jones joins Real Pod Wednesdays to discuss why Ohio State used the game plan it did against Michigan and how he thinks the Buckeyes will stack up with Georgia.

14 Dec 2022
by Dan Hope and Griffin Strom

description: Marvin Harrison Jr. becomes a unanimous All-American and Paris Johnson Jr. is a consensus All-American after both earn first-team honors from the AFCA.

description: Freshman offensive lineman Carson Hinzman is the 24th Buckeye and 18th true freshman to shed his black stripe in 2022.

description: Ryan Day said Ohio State is constantly evaluating its approach to the transfer portal but keeping its focus on players who fill needs and fit the team’s culture.

description: Ohio State running back TreVeyon Henderson will not play in the College Football Playoff due to a foot injury that will require him to undergo surgery.

description: Ryan Day expects Dallan Hayden to be “a big part of this bowl game” despite his small role against Michigan and says a TreVeyon Henderson health update is coming soon.

description: Redshirt freshman safety Jantzen Dunn is the third Buckeye to enter the transfer portal since the end of the regular season.

description: Gary Stokan formally invites OSU to the Peach Bowl and Gene Smith and Ryan Day address media members at Tuesday's press conference at the WHAC.

description: Marvin Harrison Jr. is a first-team Sporting News All-American and Tommy Eichenberg and Dawand Jones each earn second-team honors.

description: A 120-yard game by J.K. Dobbins, Raekwon McMillan’s first touchdown and a big day for Noah Brown highlighted Week 14 of the 2022 NFL season for former Ohio State players.

description: C.J. Stroud, Cade Stover, Lathan Ransom and Cameron Brown are among the Buckeyes who must step up their game in order to give Ohio State a chance at a national title berth.

description: Ohio State (and by extension, Ohio State fans) thrive on disrespect and anger. Maybe the last few weeks was exactly what the doctor ordered.

description: The AP named Marvin Harrison Jr. a first-team All-American and awarded Paris Johnson Jr., Dawand Jones, Tommy Eichenberg and Ronnie Hickman with second-team honors.

description: Ohio State defensive end Zach Harrison is the first Buckeye to accept an invitation to this year’s Senior Bowl.

title: “STORY OF EXPLOSIVE PLAYS”
description: Explosive touchdowns “ruined the whole day” for Ohio State against Michigan, and a shift in defensive philosophy may be required for the Buckeyes to beat Georgia.

title: 6 BULLDOGS THE BUCKEYES MUST GAME PLAN FOR
description: Brock Bowers, Kenny McIntosh, Darnell Washington, Jalen Carter, Christopher Smith and Kelee Ringo are six Georgia players for Ohio State to circle on the scouting report.

title: NOW OR NEVER
description: Winless in two career starts against Michigan but set to make his first CFP appearance, C.J. Stroud has an opportunity to greatly enhance his Buckeye legacy before heading to the...

title: BUCKEYES OFTEN THRIVE IN UNDERDOG ROLE
description: Ohio State has gone 8-2 as an underdog since 2012, including three College Football Playoff wins, and the Buckeyes will look to feed off doubts once again in the Peach Bowl.

title: STROUD 3RD IN HEISMAN RACE
description: C.J. Stroud finishes third in voting for the 2022 Heisman Trophy, becoming the third player in Ohio State history with two top-four finishes in the Heisman race.

title: KEENAN BAILEY PROMOTED TO TIGHT ENDS COACH
description: After seven years on the Buckeyes’ support staff, Keenan Bailey will be Ohio State’s new tight ends coach, replacing Kevin Wilson.

description: We take a look back at the 1993 Citrus Bowl, the only previous game between Ohio State and Georgia before this year’s College Football Playoff semifinal at the Peach Bowl.

title: 35-DAY LAYOFF SHOULD BENEFIT BUCKEYES
description: Come Dec. 31, it will have been five full weeks since Ohio State last played a game on the gridiron, and that extra time will help the Buckeyes fix mistakes and lick their wounds.

title: 39 BUCKEYES EARN ACADEMIC ALL-BIG TEN
description: 39 Ohio State football players earned Academic All-Big Ten honors for their efforts in the classroom this autumn, the conference announced on Friday.

title: THREE BUCKEYES NAMED ALL-AMERICANS BY FWAA
description: The FWAA named Marvin Harrison Jr. and Paris Johnson Jr. first-team All-Americans and Tommy Eichenberg a second-team All-American on Friday.

description: The Peach Bowl will feature the fourth College Football Playoff matchup between Heisman finalists when C.J. Stroud and Ohio State face Stetson Bennett and Georgia.

title: MARV, PARIS AMONG WALTER CAMP HONOREES
description: Marvin Harrison Jr. and Paris Johnson Jr. are first-team All-Americans and C.J. Stroud and Tommy Eichenberg earn second-team honors from the Walter Camp Football Foundation.

description: Tennessee wide receiver Jalin Hyatt wins the Biletnikoff Award over Marvin Harrison Jr. even though many considered Harrison to be college football’s best pass-catcher this year.

title: POLYNESIAN PLAYER OF THE YEAR FINALIST
description: Ohio State defensive end JT Tuimoloau is one of eight finalists for the Polynesian College Football Player of the Year Award.

description: Gene Smith calls for “additional support” of Ohio State’s three NIL collectives in the university's first public request for donations to collectives.

title: WILSON NAMED NFL ROOKIE OF THE WEEK
description: Garrett Wilson is the NFL's Rookie of the Week for the fourth time this season after an eight-catch, 162-yard game against the Minnesota Vikings.

title: NOT AS DOMINANT AS A YEAR AGO
description: One of the best defenses in the history of the sport led Georgia to a CFP title last season. While some of its stars remain, the unit has taken a clear step back in 2022.

description: Peach Bowl CEO Gary Stokan is excited to host Ohio State for its first-ever Peach Bowl appearance and expects a significant Buckeye fan presence in Atlanta.

title: CHOOSING VIOLENCE
description: If Ohio State's intention at 6-0 was to evolve into a jack-of-all-trades offensively, it worked. The Buckeyes have become the jack of all trades and the master of none.

title: OMARI ABOR SHEDS BLACK STRIPE
description: After missing most of the season with an injury, freshman defensive end Omari Abor has his black stripe removed.

title: 10 BUCKEYES EARN AP ALL-BIG TEN HONORS
description: C.J. Stroud, Marvin Harrison Jr., Paris Johnson Jr., J.T. Tuimloau and Tommy Eichenberg earn first-team AP All-Big Ten honors while five other Buckeyes make the second team.

title: FIRST LOOK AT THE PEACH BOWL
description: We take our first look at how Ohio State matches up with Georgia and welcome Peach Bowl CEO Gary Stokan to learn what awaits the Buckeyes and their fans in Atlanta.

07 Dec 2022

title: MORE ALL-AMERICAN HONORS FOR BUCKEYES
description: Marvin Harrison Jr. and Paris Johnson Jr. were named first-team All-Americans and J.T. Tuimoloau earned second-team recognition from The Athletic on Wednesday.

title: NFC DEFENSIVE PLAYER OF THE WEEK
description: Former Ohio State defensive end Nick Bosa earns an NFC award for the second time in as many weeks after recording three sacks in the San Francisco 49ers’ Week 13 win.

title: OSU’S PASSING GAME KEY FOR POTENTIAL UPSET
description: A big day from C.J. Stroud and Ohio State’s passing attack will be crucial to the Buckeyes’ chances of upsetting Georgia in the College Football Playoff semifinals.

title: WILSON WILL REMAIN WITH BUCKEYES FOR CFP
description: Kevin Wilson says it’s his “obligation to finish up with that team and give that team a chance to chase the national championship” before he leaves Ohio State for Tulsa.

title: FIVE BUCKEYES NAMED ALL-AMERICANS BY CBS
description: CBS Sports named Marvin Harrison Jr. and Dawand Jones first-team All-Americans and awarded C.J. Stroud, Paris Johnson Jr. and Tommy Eichenberg second-team honors.

title: BOSA, HOOKER LEAD BIG WEEK FOR NFL BUCKS
description: A three-sack day by Nick Bosa and fumble return touchdowns by Malik Hooker and Denzel Ward highlighted a monster Week 13 for former Ohio State players in the NFL.

title: OSU, JSN RETURN, UM REMATCH
description: A USC loss restores OSU's chance at a national title, JSN erases any hope for a CFP return and the Pac-12 and ACC are left at the altar once again.

title: STROUD A HEISMAN FINALIST AGAIN
description: C.J. Stroud is Ohio State’s first two-time finalist for the Heisman Trophy since the Heisman Trust began naming multiple finalists in 1982.

title: TERADJA MITCHELL ENTERS TRANSFER PORTAL
description: Ohio State linebacker Teradja Mitchell is entering the portal to play a sixth season of college football elsewhere, though he plans to finish out the year with the Buckeyes.

title: TULSA HIRES KEVIN WILSON
description: Tulsa has hired Ohio State offensive coordinator Kevin Wilson as its new head coach.

title: JSN WILL NOT PLAY IN CFP
description: Ohio State wide receiver Jaxon Smith-Njigba will not play in the College Football Playoff, instead opting to continue rehabbing his injury and prepare for the 2023 NFL draft.

title: FIVE THINGS TO KNOW ABOUT GEORGIA
description: Georgia has the longest win streak in the FBS and the best run defense in the country but allowed LSU to throw for 502 yards in the SEC title game.

title: JAYLEN JOHNSON ENTERS TRANSFER PORTAL
description: Redshirt freshman safety Jaylen Johnson becomes the first Ohio State player to enter the transfer portal following the 2022 regular season as the transfer portal window opens.

title: OSU TURNS PAGE AFTER “HARD LOOK” AT LOSS
description: Ryan Day said the Buckeyes began preparing to play in the College Football Playoff last week even though they didn’t know for sure if they’d be in the playoff until Sunday.

title: JSN’S RETURN FOR CFP STILL IN QUESTION
description: Jaxon Smith-Njigba's return is still a question mark for Ohio State, but Ryan Day said Sunday he expects an update on the receiver's status in “the next couple of days.”

title: DAY, SMART STUDY EACH OTHER’S PROGRAMS
description: Ryan Day and Kirby Smart both said they’ve studied each other’s programs during the offseason while previewing the Ohio State vs. Georgia matchup in the Peach Bowl.

title: DAY TALKS CFP, GEORGIA, MICHIGAN
description: Ryan Day discusses Ohio State's CFP placement, the forthcoming matchup with No. 1-ranked Georgia and reflects on last weekend's Michigan loss.

title: KIRBY SMART TALKS OHIO STATE
description: Georgia coach Kirby Smart says Ohio State is a “premier matchup“ for the Bulldogs in the CFP and believes the game will boil down to “turnovers and explosive plays.”

title: BUCKEYE REACTIONS AFTER EARNING CFP BERTH
description: We gathered up some of the reactions on social media after Ohio State earned a College Football Playoff berth and a meeting with Georgia in the semifinals.

title: “NOW WE'RE BACK IN CONTROL OF OUR DESTINY”
description: Ryan Day tells ESPN there's “unbelievable excitement” at Ohio State after learning it will play No. 1 Georgia in a CFP semifinal matchup in Atlanta.

title: OSU A TOUCHDOWN UNDERDOG AGAINST GEORGIA
description: The Buckeyes will head to the College Football Playoff as underdogs for the first time this season, as Georgia currently projects as a seven-point favorite.

title: OHIO STATE TO FACE GEORGIA IN CFP
description: Ohio State receives the final spot in the College Football Playoff and will face top-ranked Georgia in the semifinal on New Year's Eve.

title: FIFTH CFP BERTH IN NINE YEARS
description: Ohio State breaks a tie with Oklahoma for the third-most College Football Playoff appearances and will enter this year's tournament with the most CFP experience of the field.

title: COMMITTEE FAVORS TCU’S “BODY OF WORK”
description: CFP selection committee chairman Boo Corrigan said there was no discussion about avoiding an Ohio State/Michigan rematch but the committee felt TCU deserved the No. 3 seed.

title: FIVE FRESHMEN WHO HAVE FLASHED THIS YEAR
description: Dallan Hayden, Caden Curry, Sonny Styles, Jyaire Brown and Kye Stokes flashed the most among freshmen during Ohio State’s regular season.

title: AN OHIO STATE VS. MICHIGAN SEMIFINAL?
description: TCU’s loss to Kansas State in the Big 12 Championship Game sets up a possible Ohio State vs. Michigan semifinal if the Buckeyes jump the Horned Frogs in the rankings.

title: “IT’S ALMOST LIKE A SECOND LEASE ON LIFE”
description: Ryan Day said Ohio State is “going to play loose, we're going to be aggressive and we're gonna go at people” after getting the help it needed to make the CFP.

title: REACTION FROM OSU AS USC GOES DOWN
description: Marvin Harrison Jr., Emeka Egbuka, Miyan Williams and other notable figures reacted on social media to Utah’s win over USC and Ohio State’s potential playoff berth.

title: USC LOSS LIKELY PROPELS BUCKEYES INTO CFP
description: Ohio State’s College Football Playoff chances look promising once again after USC suffered its second loss of the season against Utah in the Pac-12 Championship Game.

title: OFFENSE INCONSISTENT SINCE THE BYE
description: The Buckeye offense scored 15 fewer touchdowns on nine more drives in the second half of the season and averaged 102 fewer yards per game than it did in the first half.

title: STROUD A FINALIST FOR MANNING AWARD
description: C.J. Stroud is one of 11 finalists for the Manning Award, which is the lone quarterback honor that takes bowl performances into consideration.

title: VINCENT ACCEPTS SHRINE BOWL INVITATION
description: Taron Vincent is going to the East-West Shrine Bowl, becoming the first Buckeye to accept an invitation to one of this year’s postseason all-star games for NFL draft prospects.

title: 11W ROUNDTABLE
description: Ohio State may not be in Indy but that won't stop the 11W Roundtable as Chase Brown, Garrick Hodge and Andy Vance discuss the loss to Michigan and what's next.

title: BUCKEYES WITH NFL DRAFT DECISIONS TO MAKE
description: We take a look at eight Ohio State starters who have NFL draft decisions to make and how their decisions could impact the Buckeyes’ 2023 roster.

title: A ROOKIE OF THE WEEK HAT TRICK
description: For the third time this season, Garrett Wilson is the NFL Rookie of the Week.

title: HARTLINE PLANS TO STAY AT OHIO STATE
description: Brian Hartline says “my heart is at Ohio State and I do not have any plans to go anywhere else” after being connected to Cincinnati’s head coaching job.

title: “DAY ONE TRAINING CAMP STUFF” BEATS BUCKS
description: Michigan co-offensive coordinator Matt Weiss says the Wolverines' offense beat the Buckeyes' defense with “day one training camp stuff.”

description: In the second installment of this home-and-home series, Ramzy drops by the Film Room for more group therapy.

description: We break down the 12 plays that swung a game Ohio State had control of early into a 22-point win for Michigan.

description: Ohio State wide receivers coach Brian Hartline will reportedly interview for the head coaching job at Cincinnati, according to Football Scoop’s John Brice.

description: Marvin Harrison Jr., Tommy Eichenberg and Dawand Jones headline the list of seven Buckeyes to earn All-American recognition from Pro Football Focus.

description: C.J. Stroud is one of five finalists for the Walter Camp Player of the Year award along with Blake Corum, Max Duggan, Hendon Hooker and Caleb Williams.

title: FILM STUDY FROM HELL
description: Ohio State lost to Michigan again. There's a bourbon for that. There's also sturdy football X&O analysis for that. What if...we combined them?

title: 10 OFFENSIVE BUCKEYES EARN ALL-B1G HONORS
description: First-team selections C.J. Stroud, Marvin Harrison Jr., Paris Johnson Jr. and Donovan Jackson lead 10 All-Big Ten honorees from Ohio State’s offense.

title: HARRISON NAMED B1G RECEIVER OF THE YEAR
description: Marvin Harrison Jr. becomes the first Ohio State wide receiver ever to win the Big Ten’s Richter-Howard Receiver of the Year award after a standout 2022 season.

description: When you fail to win the surest way, you create new ways to lose instead.

title: OFFICIAL PETITION TO REINSTATE 2010 WINS
description: Ohio State vacated 12 wins from the 2010 season due to the "Tattoogate" scandal. Now, Ohio lawmakers are petitioning the NCAA to reinstate them.

title: SEVEN BUCKEYES LOOK TO IMPRESS AT COMBINE
description: Chris Olave, Garrett Wilson, Thayer Munford, Nicholas Petit-Frere, Haskell Garrett, Tyreke Smith and Jeremy Ruckert represent Ohio State at this week’s NFL Scouting Combine.

title: MCCALISTER HELPING BUCKEYES LEARN DEFENSE
description: Ohio State’s other defenders have turned to Tanner McCalister, who’s already played for Jim Knowles for four years, to help them learn the Buckeyes’ new defensive scheme.

title: TRE BIEN
description: TreVeyon Henderson and company struggled running the ball against strong defenses in 2021. Improving consistency to complement a lethal passing attack should be a 2022 goal.

title: “ALL WE KNOW IS BEATING OHIO STATE”
description: Like most of Michigan's roster, Wolverine quarterback J.J. McCarthy has never experienced a loss to Ohio State.

title: BUCKEYES HAVE HIGH HOPES FOR JOE ROYER
description: Joe Royer, who Kevin Wilson says “has really come on very, very well,” could be in line to play a major role at tight end for Ohio State in his third year as a Buckeye.

title: WARREN G. HARDING
description: Warren G. Harding has supplied Ohio State with talented players through the decades including Paul Warfield, Korey Stringer, Maurice Clarett and Boom Herron.

title: POSITION-BY-POSITION ROSTER BREAKDOWN
description: We take a look at how Ohio State’s 2022 roster stacks up in terms of depth and experience at every position group entering spring practices.

title: COMBINE TIME
description: Thayer Munford wants to “show people that I’m more than a third-round draft pick” at next week’s NFL Scouting Combine, where he’ll work out and interview with NFL teams.

title: DIXON, WEBER SELECTED IN USFL DRAFT
description: Former Ohio State wide receiver Johnnie Dixon and running back Mike Weber were among the players selected in the USFL Draft.

title: NORM SAVES THE DAY
description: Anthony Carter was about to make one of the signature plays of the Ohio State-Michigan rivalry. It would have been replayed forever.

title: BROWN READY TO COMPETE, BECOME A LEADER
description: New quarterback Devin Brown says he’s committed to Ohio State “through and through” and is striving to become a leader “right away” even if he has to wait his turn to...

title: NEXT MEN UP
description: Ryan Day's offense lost about half of its 2021 pass-catching production with Garrett Wilson, Chris Olave and Jeremy Ruckert NFL-bound, but the cupboard looks sufficiently stocked.

title: REMAINING ELIGIBILITY FOR EACH BUCKEYE
description: Factoring in the additional year of eligibility all players received in 2020, we take a look at how much eligibility every Ohio State scholarship player still has entering 2022.

title: POST-SUPER BOWL NFL MOCK DRAFT ROUNDUP
description: Seven Ohio State draft prospects appear in post-Super Bowl mock drafts, led by a pair of projected first-round wide receivers in Garrett Wilson and Chris Olave.

title: PICKERINGTON CENTRAL
description: Pickerington Central has become a hotbed for producing talented Buckeyes since the turn of the century. This fall, Sonny Styles will become the eighth Tiger to play for Ohio State.

title: B1G LIKELY TO STAY AT 9 CONFERENCE GAMES
description: Gene Smith says the Big Ten, ACC and Pac-12 are no longer talking about playing annual games against each other, and he doesn’t think that would have benefitted Ohio State.

title: NO BAD-WEATHER CFP GAMES IN SHOE
description: Gene Smith thinks it would be better for Ohio State to play indoors in Indianapolis rather than hosting a College Football Playoff game in winter weather at Ohio Stadium.

title: SMITH, DAY HAVEN’T DISCUSSED NEW CONTRACT
description: Gene Smith plans to discuss Ryan Day's contract at some point, but those conversations have yet to take place as Smith says “I don't feel an urgency” to do so.

title: THE BUCKEYES HAVE GOTTEN BIGGER
description: Ohio State's roster saw some collective gains this season with Jack Sawyer and Andre Turrentine each adding 20 pounds since last fall.

title: BACK AND TO THE LEFT
description: The Buckeyes were inches from pulling within one score of LSU and taking control of BCS title game momentum. Instead, it all fell apart.

title: SMITH TALKS DAY'S CONTRACT, NIL, CFP MODEL
description: Ohio State athletic director Gene Smith discussed the ever-changing college sports landscape at a press conference at the WHAC Wednesday.

title: A 17-POINT FAVORITE AGAINST GEORGIA?
description: We make our early picks for who will make the College Football Playoff and assess Ohio State’s recruiting class of 2018 after four years.
date:
16 Feb 2022
by Dan Hope and Griffin Strom
11 COMMENTS

title: SIMON LOOKS TO BUILD OFF SOPHOMORE SEASON
description: Cody Simon says the ups and downs of his sophomore year were “super important” to his development, and he’s “feeling really good” as he recovers from shoulder surgery.

title: OHIO STATE’S TOP NFL PERFORMERS OF 2021
description: Cameron Heyward, Nick Bosa, Joey Bosa, Corey Linsley and Marshon Lattimore lead our list of Ohio State’s top 15 performers for the 2021 NFL season.

title: WAY-TOO-EARLY FAVORITES OVER BAMA & UGA
description: Action Network lists Ohio State as a 2-point favorite over Alabama and a massive 17-point favorite over Georgia in hypothetical 2022 College Football Playoff matchups.

title: INCREASED INTENSITY IN WINTER WORKOUTS
description: Returning Ohio State players have seen increased intensity in winter workouts, with Cade Stover calling last week ”the best week of workouts we’ve had ever since I’ve been...

title: 4 BUCKEYES START FOR BENGALS, BUT RAMS WIN
description: Former Ohio State players Eli Apple, Vonn Bell, Sam Hubbard and Isaiah Prince all started the Super Bowl for the Cincinnati Bengals, but they lost to the Los Angeles Rams.

title: HUBBARD WON’T BE SATISFIED WITHOUT A WIN
description: Although Sam Hubbard feels fortunate to be playing in the Super Bowl with his hometown team, he says the Bengals need to win on Sunday before they can celebrate anything.

title: STOVER EXPECTS TO MAKE BIG IMPACT AT LB
description: Cade Stover is happy to be back at linebacker after two years as a tight end and believes he can impact the game “every single play” now that he’s back on defense.

title: ARCHBISHOP MOELLER
description: Archbishop Moeller has a rich tradition of supplying Ohio State with football talent including Super Bowl-bound Sam Hubbard, one of 20 Crusaders who has played for the Buckeyes.

title: BUCKEYES TO WORK CAMPS AROUND THE COUNTRY
description: At least 16 Ohio State football players will be serving as instructors at Nike Sports Camps in Ohio and around the country this summer as part of an NIL deal.

title: APPLE, BELL BRING BUCKEYE BOND TO BENGALS
description: Eli Apple and Vonn Bell have had a brotherly relationship since they played together at Ohio State, and both have played key roles in the Bengals’ secondary this season.

title: LONG ON TALENT, SHORT ON TIME
description: How long coordinators are given to change the fortunes of an offense or defense is dictated by the expectations of a program and their fanbase.

title: VRABEL NAMED NFL COACH OF THE YEAR
description: Mike Vrabel is the AP NFL Coach of the Year, becoming the first-ever former Ohio State player to win the award.

title: CORMONTAE HAMILTON NO LONGER WITH BUCKEYES
description: CorMontae Hamilton, who played only sparingly in three seasons with the Buckeyes as a defensive end and tight end, is no longer on the Ohio State football team.

title: OSU AMONG NATIONAL LEADERS IN NIL DEALS
description: Ohio State athletes made nearly $3 million on more than 600 total deals in the first seven months of college athletes being allowed to profit from their name, image and likeness.

title: THE RECLAMATION OF NICK BOSA
description: The Buckeyes and Hawkeyes were tied at 17 in Iowa City when the visitors' best player was ejected. The home team proceeded to finish the game on a 38-7 run.

title: EARLY ENROLLEES, ANN ARBOR DRAMA
description: We share our takeaways from meeting Ohio State’s early enrollees, discuss the coaching staff drama at Michigan and debate whether Joe Burrow should be considered a Buckeye.
date:
09 Feb 2022
by Dan Hope and Griffin Strom
9 COMMENTS

title: SEVEN BUCKEYES INVITED TO NFL COMBINE
description: Chris Olave, Garrett Wilson, Jeremy Ruckert, Thayer Munford, Nicholas Petit-Frere, Haskell Garrett and Tyreke Smith have been invited to the 2022 NFL Scouting Combine.

title: PRINCE “NEVER STOPPED BELIEVING IN MYSELF”
description: Isaiah Prince says he never doubted his ability amid the ups and downs in his journey from Ohio State to becoming a Super Bowl starter for the Cincinnati Bengals.

title: JALIN JOINS J.T. IN EDMONTON
description: Former Ohio State wide receiver Jalin Marshall signs with the CFL’s Edmonton Elks, who also signed his former Ohio State quarterback J.T. Barrett in January.

title: SUPER SOPHS '22
description: Ohio State returns drastically more production next season than the other 2022 national title contenders.

title: A LOOK AT THE OTHER FAN-SUBMITTED DESIGNS
description: We take a look at some of the most creative and unique designs Ohio State fans submitted for the new field at Ohio Stadium.

title: NEW OHIO STADIUM TURF DESIGN UNVEILED
description: Ohio State has unveiled the design of its new turf for Ohio Stadium, which features several tweaks from the previous design.

title: KNOWLES WANTS D TO “CREATE INDECISION”
description: Tanner McCalister says Jim Knowles’ defense will be aggressive and try to make offenses react to what the Buckeyes do rather than the other way around.

title: GARRETT, SMITH CONTRIBUTE TO SENIOR BOWL W
description: Tyreke Smith recorded a sack while Haskell Garrett had three tackles and multiple quarterback pressures in a 20-10 Senior Bowl win for the National Team.

title: OHIO STATE'S SUPER BOWL HISTORY
description: Eli Apple, Vonn Bell, Sam Hubbard and Isaiah Prince will likely create Ohio State history as the first time four Buckeyes have started in a Super Bowl.

title: “THE RIGHT TIME” FOR WALTON TO RETURN
description: New Ohio State secondary/cornerbacks coach Tim Walton is excited to be back at his alma mater after more than a decade coaching in the NFL.

title: SPRING GAME SET FOR APRIL 16
description: Ohio State’s spring football game will be played on April 16.

title: JSN'S NEW CUSTOM RIDE
description: The NIL era is in full swing, and Jaxon Smith-Njigba took full advantage with a slick new custom truck.

title: “I DON'T HAVE FOUR YEARS HERE”
description: The expected timeframe for a defensive turnaround will be shorter than ever before for Jim Knowles, who knows the pressure is on for immediate results in Columbus.

title: THE LEGEND OF SEVYN
description: Sevyn Banks never lived up to the insane amounts of hype bestowed upon him in the offseason, but that's no crime.

title: NEW BUCKEYES GETTING TO KNOW NEW COACHES
description: Six of Ohio State’s 11 early enrollees are still getting to know their new position coaches after staff changes, but they like the first impressions they’ve gotten.

title: RHOADS LEAVING TO BECOME HIGH SCHOOL DC
description: Paul Rhoads, who was a defensive analyst at Ohio State in 2021, is leaving the Buckeyes to become the defensive coordinator at Gulf Shores High School in Alabama.

title: CURRY ENVISIONS PLAYING LEO FOR OSU
description: In high school, Caden Curry was primarily a big body along the defensive line. He'd like to be a roaming defensive end for Ohio State.

title: SEVYN BANKS ENTERS TRANSFER PORTAL
description: Former Ohio State cornerback Sevyn Banks has entered the transfer portal, opting to use his additional year of eligibility at another school.

title: DAY HAS NO PLANS TO LEAVE OHIO STATE
description: Ryan Day told Big Ten Network that he loves Ohio State and “if I was to go take another job, I'd be going by myself because my family's not leaving Columbus.”

title: JP ANDRADE TRANSFERS TO JACKSON STATE
description: Former Ohio State walk-on quarterback JP Andrade is transferring to Jackson State, where he’ll play for Deion Sanders.

title: FRYE WANTS O-LINE TO BE “FELT” IN 2022
description: New Ohio State offensive line coach Justin Frye says the Buckeye offense is already “damn good,” and he hopes to enhance that in his first year on staff.

title: “A LOT OF HARD WORK'S BEEN PUT IN”
description: Ryan Day and his new assistant coaches took to his radio show to discuss Ohio State's new freshman class, hitting the recruiting trail, changes we'll see with the team, and more.

title: MIDYEAR ENROLLEES AND TRANSFERS SPEAK
description: Ohio State’s midyear enrollees and transfer additions DeaMonte Trayanum and Tanner McCalister met with the media for the first time Wednesday.

title: OHIO STATE’S FULL RECRUITING CLASS OF 2022
description: We take a look at Ohio State’s full recruiting class of 2022, which includes 11 freshmen who are already on campus and 10 more signees who will arrive this summer.

title: BROKEN ARROW
description: Once upon a time a beloved backup QB took a graduate transfer from Columbus to Baton Rouge and produced arguably the greatest season in history. This week we ask: What if.

title: DALLAS GANT TO TOLEDO
description: Dallas Gant is headed to Toledo as the former Ohio State linebacker signs with the Rockets.

title: PROJECTING THE STARS OF THE ’22 CLASS
description: We project which players we expect to become stars from Ohio State’s recruiting class of 2022 and share our first impressions from meeting the new assistant coaches.
date:
02 Feb 2022
by Dan Hope and Griffin Strom

title: OMARI ABOR
description: Ohio State successfully fended off Texas A&M and Texas to land Omari Abor, one of the top defensive ends in the recruiting class of 2022.

title: CARSON HINZMAN
description: Carson Hinzman picked Ohio State because of his desire to compete for championships over staying home and playing for Wisconsin.

title: DAY WILL CONTINUE RUNNING OFFENSE
description: Even though Ohio State now has an offensive coordinator, passing game coordinator and run game coordinator, Ryan Day will continue to call the Buckeyes’ offensive plays.

title: FIXING THE SECONDARY A TWO-MAN JOB FOR OSU
description: Tim Walton and Perry Eliano already have "great chemistry" working in tandem to improve the Ohio State secondary, and Ryan Day says the Buckeyes are fortunate to have them.

title: DAY’S STAFF OVERHAUL TOUGH BUT NECESSARY
description: Ryan Day opted to replace most of Ohio State’s defensive coaching staff because he felt a “fresh start” was needed after two years of substandard defensive play.

title: NEW OSU ASSISTANTS MEET WITH MEDIA
description: For the first time since they were all hired, all four of Ohio State's new assistant coaches met with reporters on Monday.
